title: Loviatar's Scourge
content:
Willing Whip: Grants resistance to Necrotic damage. Deal an additional 1-6 Necrotic damage to nearby targets, including the wielder.

Grants Resistance to Necrotic damage.

A simple but effective Loviatar's Scourge, cast en masse by human blacksmiths.
